content.title: Widow Daughter Marriage Scheme
content.department: Department of Women and Child Development
content.details: Financial Assistance for the marriage of daughters of poor widows and orphan girls is the welfare scheme of Govt. of NCT of Delhi to provide financial assistance to the poor widows for performing the marriage of their daughters (up to two daughters) and to provide financial assistance to the guardians including Homes/Institutions or foster parents of an orphan girl or an orphan girl for her marriage. The quantum of Assistance is one time Rs. 30,000 (Rs. Thirty Thousand only per application) up to two daughters only.
benefits: One-time financial assistance of Rs. 30,000 for marriage
Support for poor widows and orphan girls
eligibility: Applicant must be a resident of Delhi for the last 5 years
Annual income should be less than Rs. 1,00,000 from all sources
exclusions: Applicants with income exceeding Rs. 1,00,000 per year
content.application_process: Application can be submitted online on e-district portal or offline to the District WCD Officer concerned.
documents_required: Death certificate of husband (for widow applicants)
Proof of residence (Ration card, voter ID, etc.)
Age proof of girl (school leaving certificate or birth certificate)
Self-declaration of no other financial assistance received
Bank passbook/statement for last one year

faqs.question: Is Aadhaar number necessary for applying for WDM?
faqs.answer: Single operated Aadhar linked bank account of any bank in Delhi only.

faqs.question: Can an applicant apply for financial assistance under WDM who is not resident of Delhi?
faqs.answer: No, the scheme is only for the residents of Delhi, residing from last 5 years.

faqs.question: What is the quantum of financial assistance under WDM Scheme?
Is any recommendation or attestation required?
faqs.answer: Yes, the application should be attested from Gazetted Officer or area MP/MLA.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to change address?
faqs.answer: Application has to be given along with documentary proof of changed address to the concerned District W&CD Office.

faqs.question: Is there any verification required before getting WDM scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Yes, the District Officer, WCD will verify the documents and if required home visit will be done before sanction of assistance.
